# Thirst (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | Azul |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers:** Rebuke or command oozes as an evil cleric rebukes or commands undead. Use this ability a total number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifi er. You also gain a +2 bonus on Constitution checks to resist dehydration.

**Thirst Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Parching Touch (Spell)|Parching Touch]]****:** One touch/level deals 1d6 damage and possibly 1 Con damage.

**2** **[[Desiccate (Spell)|Desiccate]]****:** Deals 1d6/2 levels dessication damage and dehydrates living creature.

**3** **[[Tormenting Thirst (Spell)|Tormenting Thirst]]****:** Subject is overwhelmed by thirst.

**4 [[Dispel Water (Spell)|Dispel Water]]:** Cancels water spells and effects or dismisses water creatures. 

**5** **[[Desiccate, Mass (Spell)|Desiccate, Mass]]****:** Desiccates several creatures.

**6** **[[Symbol of Thirst (Spell)|Symbol of Thirst]]****<sup> M</sup>:** Triggered rune overwhelms nearby creatures with thirst.

**7** **[[Mephit Mob (Spell)|Mephit Mob]]** **<sup>\*</sup>:** Summons multiple mephits.

**8** **[[Horrid Wilting (Spell)|Horrid Wilting]]****:** Deals 1d6 damage /level within 30 ft. 

**9** **[[Energy Drain (Spell)|Energy Drain]]****:** Subject gains 2d4 negative levels.

   \* Dust, salt, or sulfur mephits only.

**Source:** Sandstorm (WotC), pg. 108
